# BookmarkFile.move_item method

```csharp
public static bool move_item(IntPtr bookmark, string old_uri, string new_uri, out IntPtr error)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| bookmark | Transfer ownership: none |
| old_uri | Transfer ownership: none |
| new_uri | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |
| error | Pointer to an error or IntPtr.Zero |

## Return Value

Transfer ownership: none
